allow: Bash(python -c "from docx import Document; doc = Document(''CourseSchedulingCriteria.docx''); print(''\n''.join([p.text for p in doc.paragraphs]))")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: UVA Batten Course Scheduling Tool

- Full-featured CSP-based scheduling algorithm with greedy fallback
- Excel/CSV file upload for faculty preferences and course data
- Conflict detection and visualization
- Grid and list schedule views with 12-hour time format
- Room assignment based on priority rules (Dell, Rouss, Pavilion VIII)
- Export to Excel functionality
- UVA Batten branding with Garrett Hall background
- Comprehensive REQUIREMENTS.md for scheduling criteria
- Sample CSV templates for faculty and courses

Built for Judy and the UVA Batten Course Scheduling Team
October 2025
EOF
)")
